vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἄσπῐλ-ος, ον,
literal stainless: hence, faultless, without blemish, λίθοι[NT+1st c.AD+]: comparative and superlative variants for {ἀσπίλωτος} in [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__II ἄσπιλος· χειμάρρους [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
without spot, defect or blemish
spotless, unblemished, without defect, pure, 1Tim. 6:14; Jas. 1:27; 1Pet. 1:19; 2Pet. 3:14*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: puro, inmaculado, impecable, sin mancha ; sin defecto
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (外在的) 沒有瑕疵的, 無污點的 (彼前 1:19)
2) (內在的) 純潔, 無可指摘的
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (外在的) 没有瑕疵的, 无污点的 (彼前 1:19)
2) (内在的) 纯洁, 无可指摘的
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: không tì vết; không chỗ trách được ; không chê trách được
